}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Likely compatible services=== *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.g.comcast.net/device.php?devid=438 '''Comcast''' device database entry])
A firmware update supposedly upgrades the device to 32x8 from 24x8 DOCSIS 3.0. :See [https://www.dslreports.com/forum/r30741437-Firmware-Arris-TG1682G ''(Firmware) Arris TG1682G'' on '''DSL Reports''']
